many

>>look on this maybe I'm wrong but that is why we are here ;-)
>>
>>Wizard is a master Explorer he looks for a knowledge about world, magic,
items
>>and people all around a world. Why he do this is of many reasons to help his

>>not important now but all wizards try to do this.
>>To be able to do this he is a god land traveler, he can unleash a nice

>If you give a second bind point to wizards then all other magi or clerical
>casters deserve one too. This would in effect give you "recall" which Verant

I say bind point wich will function in same zone only and as you zone out
it will be canceled.
Other limitation idea can be a spell component i suggest it as a run from
combat spell so it can also teleport to zone entrance .
Cleric have a invulnerability spell to run from combat, all other magi can
use his pet as monster slowing factor and have gate.




>>b.) Better exploration spells like invisible eye of zoom with longer
duration.
>>
>>c.) Item locator. As we are item hunters we can have a spell which can
>function
>>as ranger tracker for items in zone so we can see all items in zone and
we can
>>turn in direction where item is !!
>

Wizards are one wich are specific as item hunter similar to ranger wich is
animal hunter so i think that it can be wizard only but also can be
included in enchanter spells but i think that enchanters have many group
oriented spells and a wizard is nearly without similar spells until a group
teleports and escape.

which is
>>a pet it can defend, attack and also sacrifice and many more long duration

>>

>Again there is no legitimate reason for thsi to be asked for especially as a
>class specific thing. In reference to your rationale, well in combat other
>classes can't cast as damaging spells or as fast as you can. Also to
>recover the mana from a pet requires the waastage of one of the 8 spell
>slots and it isn't a very mana efficient operation in the first place.

Yes but you can see that you summon a pet sit meditate your mana back and
pet will stay with you as long as it will not die you can hunt in one zone
two days if you wish. and when meditate to get mana back you cancel a pet
slot end put in one other spell :-). You will enter in combat with a full
mana and probably many buffs on your pet and on yourself and your party
members it is all count at your mana. if you cont all benefits and how long
it can work you will se that wizard have need to recover faster he cannot
accumulate mana in long duration spells, pets or buffs.
